If your view is a static view that is not intended to be navigated away, set this to false. (For example: File explorer, calendar, etc.) If your view opens a file or can be otherwise navigated, set this to true. (For example: Markdown editor view, Kanban view, PDF view, etc.)</p><p>(Inherited from [View](03%20Documentation/TypeScript%20API/View.md)<!-- -->)</p> |
